annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Repeal of Washington Convention Center Management Act: Section 401 of D.C. Law 10-188 provided that all sections of the Washington Convention Center Management Act of 1979, effective November 3, 1979, except for §§ 3 and 4, which are codified as §§ 10-1211 and 10-1212, are repealed.
